divs: Sighting DetailsAt around 10:50 pm I was on my way home from a friend's house when I glanced to the sky noticing around 10-12 orange colored lights that were all at different heights forming a diagnol-like shape. They were too close together to be airplanes. And the color of them was like no airplane I've ever seen. They were fairly low right above a bunch of huge trees. I kept my eye on them while driving and stared for about 8 minutes until I was close to home when I went to get my parents to tell them to come see. I reasoned out all the possibilities, they werent airplanes and the werent light poles.About 5 minutes later after we all got in the car and drove back to the area where I saw them they were gone.
Summary: Around 10-12 lights in the sky very close together
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Davie
There were no other sightings in Davie on or around August 4th 2008
